text: Salwan Momika (23 June 1986 - 29 January 2025) was a refugee from Iraq who criticizes Islam and is well known for burning the Qur'an in front of many people. He was born a Christian in Iraq but says he is a atheist. He came to Sweden after he fought against Daesh by joining the Popular Mobilization Forces. There have been videos of him pledging allegiance to the Imam Ali Brigades, in military clothes. He then said that was a soldier for a brigade called the Brigade of the Spirit of God Jesus, Son of Mary. == Assassination == On 29 January 2025, Monika was gunned down at his home in Södertälje, Sweden during a TikTok livestream. He was 38 years old. He was 38 years old. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Political activists Category:2025 deaths Category:1986 births Category:Iraqi people Category:Assassinated people Category:Murders by firearm in Europe
title: Salwan Momika
